mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY (REPLY_ID, USER_ID, REVIEW_ID, REPLY_CONTENT) VALUES (REPLY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{reviewId}, #{replyContent})
mapper.update: UPDATE REPLY SET REPLY_CONTENT = #{replyContent}, REPLY_UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE REPLY_ID = #{replyId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT (*) FROM REPLY WHERE REVIEW_ID = #{reviewId}

SELECT r.REPLY_ID, r.USER_ID, r.REVIEW_ID, r.REPLY_CONTENT, r.REPLY_DATE, r.REPLY_UPDATE_DATE, u.USER_ID, u.USERNAME FROM REPLY r LEFT JOIN USER_STORE u ON r.USER_ID = u.USER_ID WHERE REPLY_ID = #{replyId}
